code: import React from"react";import ChatBot from"react-simple-chatbot";import{ThemeProvider}from"styled-components";import SpyLogo from'../Initial/spyLogo.jpg';function CustomChatbot(props){var theme={background:"white",fontFamily:"Oxanium",botBubbleColor:"gray",botFontColor:"white",userBubbleColor:"gray",userFontColor:"white"};var config={width:"100%",height:"605px"};var steps=[{id:"Greet",message:"Hello Agent.",trigger:"Ask status"},{id:"Ask status",message:"How is your training going?",trigger:"Give status options"},{id:"Give status options",options:[{value:"Poorly",label:"Poorly",trigger:"Respond to poor status"},{value:"Okay",label:"Okay",trigger:"Respond to okay status"},{value:"Great",label:"Great",trigger:"Respond to great status"}],hideInput:true},{id:"Respond to poor status",message:"I'm sorry to hear that agent! What can we do to help?",trigger:"Ask for help"},{id:"Respond to okay status",message:"Keep going Agent! Is there anything we can do to help?",trigger:"Ask for help"},{id:"Respond to great status",message:"Glad to hear it Agent. Keep up the good work!",trigger:"Done"},{id:"Ask for help",user:true,trigger:"Respond to help"},{id:"Respond to help",message:"Thanks for the input Agent. We'll bring your feedback to HQ.",trigger:"Done"},{id:"Done",message:"Good luck with your remaining missions Agent.",end:true}];return React.createElement(ThemeProvider,{theme:theme},React.createElement(ChatBot,Object.assign({className:"chat-window",handleEnd:props.handleEnd,botAvatar:SpyLogo,hideHeader:true,steps:steps,placeholder:"Enter your message..."},config)));}export default CustomChatbot;
